title: I found a small map error
body: So I noticed that "Yeti's Vigil" on the map has Nunu as the only champion associated with it... But it still uses the old Nunu splash art for the icon. I know that the map is something Riot plans to be updating and making changes to a lot from here on out, but wasn't that location added to the map AFTER Nunu's rework? Anyway, just throwing this out there in case a Rioter sees it.

replies.body:
I've submitted a bug for it - good catch!  Thanks
{{sticker:galio-happy}}

Yo Bio

The City of Gardens has the description for the "Zoantha Cascades"

Scorched Ruins

The shifting tides of the desert has been known to carve paths through bare rock, tumbling over the cliff faces in massive sandfalls. Traditionally, Shurimans toss beloved objects into the sands as gifts to the Ascended. As a result, such falls are often lucrative spots for treasure hunters.

Caught this a while back and it hasn't been fixed yet
Added to the bug list as well - thank you, mrmeddyman!
Fun fact: Nunu's ability previews in the client still have old Nunu in them. The giant snowball of doom is actually presented to new players as Nunu and his teammates' hands turning red.
